column2: This vile beast was known for his enormous physique and his cruelty. No peasant or lord in the realm was safe of their wrath.
Lilith was a Sumerian Demon that killed Children and tempted Men with her Body, draining them of their energy.
Characters of this Bloodline have a natural affection for the demonic.
Sacrificed true Love for their Duty
Organized a lion fight to my honor.
Periodically experiences flashes of great creativity and deep depression.
This character became a famed artist due to phases of great creativity and energy caused by his affective bipolar disorder.
Experiencing a phase of great creative potential.
Experiencing a phase of crippling depression.
Health Issues due to their albinism.
Health Issues due to heir Obesity
